1. 考過，同普通ielts一樣

2. 有無必要自修呢啲問題點答你呀…只可以話我考過兩次，自修7.5，有上堂8.0 (我知實有人話我低分，咁我都認既…)

3. 自修咪做sample做pastpaper，再睇下啲攻略網有咩建議

1. what is IELTS life test ?

2. Is there really a computer-based IELTS test? This is so unfair to early takers who have to write with "motor-hand" in the writing section. (that's why i prefer toefl but speaking section is weird for that exam)
